__e: 'As if he was training his body to receive these messages of punishment 'and absorb them faster than other fighters could absorb them.'
You have been brought before this court, to receive just punishment.. To pay for your crimes..
But, I suppose I have to do this penance and make my peace with you.
Once again, Aziza's words save you. Your life is saved, but I'll punish you.
If you want, and it would my biggest punishment to remain and love you like a brother.
That it's only through punishment that we learn that we're real.
Your punishment is that till I continue to read the book you should continue to kiss me ceaselessly.
It's time for me to be punished.
He feels his punishment is just.
Do you realize what this could mean for her?
Your punishment shall be to watch them die. Captain.
Your punishment is that you have to go into the kitchen and cook us dinner.
This is to punish you for not talking for so long.
Otherwise you'll be put in gaol for six years for trying to kill me. How about that?
This is my punishment for doing something I'm not cut out for. And neglecting my father's business.
Brother: "This is certainly the punishment for what we did to Joseph."
It's my punishment for being alive, for surviving my own children.
It is your punishment to watch us!
If you think that the punishment for your sins is the deaths of those people...
You're in for the punishment of a lifetime!
